nodes.text: Lots of doors. I'm sure that behind them are probably all kinds of rabid living things, dead and rotting things, or things in-between.
Such a tempting chest. Such a disappointment.
It's really dark in this corner. I can see it's a cabinet or table of some sort.
I'm not sure what that thing is above the cabinet, but I'm not going near it... A waste of my time and fear.
That thing. I don't know why it was ever put in here. Maybe there was no more room in Hell.
There's the one locked drawer that's just teasing me. Otherwise, this cabinet is full of useless junk.
That was one disappointing cabinet. Absolutely nothing in it worth my time.
That's a major stick of furniture. Lots of doors and drawers. Very tempting!
I can't really see it in this light.
I would, if I had a lockpick.
Nah. I can't pick it, and this isn't a good place to practice.

nodes.message: This increment time is ok as it only gets executed once

nodes.text: This looks like a L-bow lock. Not too tricky to open, but it does require finesse.
It's a reasonably tough lock, but I can't tell any details. I should have studied the lockpicking book more... or get my eyes checked.
Got it!
Now let's see what was stashed away in this locked drawer...
What is it?
Looks like a pair of mittens with panda designs on them... Ugly panda designs.
I guess I'll take them. Maybe I can find a use for them. Then again, maybe not.
Drat... this is a hard lock to pick.

nodes.name: Mysterious Locked Drawer
nodes.description: In the creepy dark passageway, there's this cabinet right under a monster's head. One of the drawers was locked and I couldn't open it. There's probably something interesting inside. I guess I really need to improve my lockpicking skills.

nodes.text: I'll have to work on my lockpick skills more before I can get this open.
I've already searched it. Lots of useless junk.
Except for that one locked drawer... There's probably something interesting in it if I could just unlock it.
Okay, let's see what's in this thing...

nodes.message: This increment time is ok as it only gets executed once

nodes.text: ... some broken crossbow bolts with the heads removed. Why would someone even keep these?...
... uh... it's a moldy rag or piece of clothing of some kind, and it's filled with... well... yuck. It looks like something stuck to my boots by now...
... about eighteen mummified rodents... isn't eighteen supposed to be good luck? Not for these poor sods...
Oh, and a rusty, bent old sconce! How in the world did somebody get this off the wall?
Huh... one of these cabinet drawers is locked.
I looked through it once already. It needs to be taken out and shot.
I'm not opening that up in the dark. I don't want to end up even more disgusted than I already am.
There is some sort of magic in this cabinet. It's inside one of the drawers. Feels like some sort of magical protection item. I get the impression of defense... and pandas?
There's nothing magical left here.
